title: Agavoideae-PEPC
text:
Code
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
species <- read.csv("species.csv")
colnames(species) <- c("Species", "Reference Genome Available", "Photosynthetic Pathway")

species_table <- kable(species, "html") |>
  column_spec(1, italic = TRUE, width = "2.5in") |>
  column_spec(2, width = "2.5in")

species_table





Species
Reference Genome Available
Photosynthetic Pathway




Arabidopsis thaliana
Yes
C3


Yucca aloifolia
Yes
CAM


Yucca filamentosa
Yes
C3


Yucca brevifolia (Joshua Tree)
Yes
Facultative CAM


Agave tequilana
Yes
CAM


Agave amica
No
Facultative CAM


Agave virginica 
No
CAM


Hesperoyucca whipplei
No
CAM


Asparagus Setaceus
Yes
C3


Hesperaloe funifera
No
CAM


Hesperaloe parviflora
No
CAM


Beschorneria yuccoides
No
Facultative CAM

title: FastQC
text:
Quality checks on ilumina whole genome shotgun sequencing fastq’s, collected from X.

FastQC
Andrews S. (2010). FastQC: a quality control tool for high throughput sequence data. Available online at: http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc


Code
#!/bin/bash
module load fastqc/0.12.1

fastqc $FASTQ -o sample_reports/
echo "FastQC Complete"



Results



  Agave amica
  Agave virginica
  Hesperaloe funifera
  Hesperaloe parviflora
  Hesperoyucca whipplei
  Beschorneria yuccoides











Fastp - Quality Check & Trimming
Shifu Chen, Yanqing Zhou, Yaru Chen, Jia Gu, fastp: an ultra-fast all-in-one FASTQ preprocessor, Bioinformatics, Volume 34, Issue 17, September 2018, Pages i884–i890, https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/bty560


Code
#!/bin/bash
fastp -i $FASTQ \
      -o sample.trim.fastq \
      -h sample.fastp.html \
      -j sample.fastp.json \
      -w "x" 
echo "Fastq complete"



Results


  
    Agave amica
    Agave virginica
    Hesperaloe funifera
    Hesperaloe parviflora
    Hesperoyucca whipplei
    Beschorneria yuccoides
